TopicTitle: I got to the Moon! Now to plan the rescue mission.

Articles.Content:
Yes, the Moon. Not Mun.

January 18th, 1951. Americans set foot on the Moon, beating the Russians in the space race completely.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Mods used:

Real Solar System

SMURFF (to make tank drymasses acceptable)

SpaceY.

Dont you mean The russians beat the americans...

Dont you mean The russians beat the americans...

Well no, because its 1951 and Kerbal-Americans are on the moon. Sputnik wasn't even launched until 1956.
but that is direct accent which both the US and russia considered but russia got a lot farther with their DA stuff because they thought that MOR was too dangerous.

but that is direct accent which both the US and russia considered but russia got a lot farther with their DA stuff because they thought that MOR was too dangerous.

Russia never planned on Direct Ascent. They planned to do Lunar Orbit Rendezvous, just like Apollo.

My rocket is direct ascent because I'm a scrub and I thought it could handle it.
